channel.title: Auto-Talker With Anti-Ban

item.title: Auto-Talker With Anti-Ban
item.dc:creator: @hey321 hey321
item.description:
@hey321 wrote:

[php]{.Script Info:

ScriptName = Auto-Talker

Author = Hey321

Description = Auto-Talks for ya for specified times

Version = 6.01

Date = Thursday, November, 9TH, 3: 30: 41 PM

Comments = Good script

/Script Info}
program MessageWriter;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}

const
Message1=(‘dghdt’);
Message2=(‘htdry’);
WaitTime=1;
NumLoops=5000;

var
MessagesTyped: Integer;

procedure login;
begin
NumberOfPlayers(1);
Players[0].name := (’’);
Players[0].pass := (’’);
Players[0].nick := (’’);
NickNameBMP := CreateBitmapMaskFromText(Players[CurrentPlayer].Nick, UpChars);

if(not loggedin)then
loginplayer
end;

Procedure DoRandoms;
begin
FindNormalRandoms;
end;

procedure MessageSender;
begin
ActivateClient;
TypeSend(Message2+chr(13));
Sleep(1)
TypeSend(Message1+chr(13));
Sleep(1);
MessagesTyped:=MessagesTyped+2;
end;

procedure TimeToWait;
begin
wait (waittime + random (250));
end;

procedure ProgressReport;
begin
Writeln(’[]—////////////////////\\\—[]’);
Writeln(’ Thanks for using Hey321s’);
Writeln(’ Auto-Talker ‘);
Writeln(’ Worked for:’ +ScriptTime2(2));
Writeln(’ Sentences typed: ‘+IntToStr(MessagesTyped)+’’);
Writeln(’ Sentences left: ‘+IntToStr(NumLoops-MessagesTyped)+’’);
Writeln(’[]—////////////////////\\\—[]’);
end;

begin
ClearDebug;
SetupSRL;
login
repeat
MessageSender;
DoRandoms;
TimeToWait;
DoRandoms;
ProgressReport;
until(MessagesTyped = NumLoops);
wait(WaitTime + random (50));
DoRandoms;
end.[/php]

Pros:
Login
Anti-Ban
Set number of Sentences
Tells you how many Sentences left

Cons:
Big script

I will update when i get bored enough to make it better.
